item.title: Blog
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Security Vulnerability Scanning in CI/CD Pipelines Dec 17, 2023 A security vulnerability represents a system weakness that, if exploited, can lead to unauthorized access to confidential data, violate data integrity, or result in denial of service. It is necessary to proactively identify and mitigate vulnerabilities prior to deployment into the production environment. Automated scanning processes integrated into the CI/CD pipeline play a pivotal role in achieving this goal.
